item.title: Docs: Server
item.description:
Our server is hosted in the world’s largest data center in France and managed by experienced Mastodon server admins from the Spacebear federation.

Registration

Registration is currently: open
Register here: https://datasci.social/auth/sign_up
Current estimated capacity: 500

Status

Current status: https://stats.uptimerobot.com/DllMwIoAWM

Historical uptimes

Year Uptime Downtime, human-readable
2022 99.995% max. 3 minutes down in 6 weeks

Outages

List of outages: /tags/outage

Miscellaneous

  • Custom emojis: https://emojos.in/datasci.social
  • mastodon.help directory: https://mastodon.help/instances?id=17318
  • instances.social directory: https://instances.social/datasci.social

item.title: Blog: 99.990% Uptime
item.description:
[Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109506480484787426]

Happy to report that in the first 3+ weeks of running datasci.social we had 99.990% uptime. We missed one 5-minute tick. #mastoadmin #serverinfo
https://stats.uptimerobot.com/DllMwIoAWM

item.title: Blog: Email outage
item.description:
[Post copied from https://datasci.social/@mszll/109374854036872933]

We had a slight hiccup at datasci.social with our email provider in the last ~16 hours which has been resolved now. (Was due to #TwitterMigration) Sorry for any delays in receiving system emails, like for sign-up. #mastoadmin #serverinfo
